data.title: 13 facts you need to know about 'Yes Indeed' rapper Lil Baby
data.meta_description: Here's everything you need to know about rapper Lil Baby, from his age and height to his biggest songs and more.
data.text:
Here's everything you need to know about rapper Lil Baby, from his age and height to his biggest songs and more.

1. Has Lil Baby won any Grammys?

Lil Baby earned his first nomination at the 2020 Grammys for 'Drip Too Hard', his collaboration with Gunna, for Best Rap/Sung Performance. Ahead of the 2021 ceremony, he earned two more nominations; Best Rap Performance and Best Rap Song for his song, 'The Bigger Picture'. Picture: Instagram

2. Who is Lil Baby signed to?

Lil Baby is signed to Quality Control Music, an American label whose music is distributed through Motown and Caroline, subsidiaries of the Capitol Music Group. Other artists belonging to Quality Control Music include Migos, City Girls and Lil Yachty. Picture: Instagram

3. Is Lil Baby dating Gunna's ex Heather Rose?

Lil Baby is rumoured to be dating Instagram model Heather Rose, who is alleged to have been romantically involved with Gunna, Lil Baby's frequent collaborator. The rapper is yet to address the claims. (Picture: Getty/Instagram)

4. What is Lil Baby's real name?

Lil Baby's real name is Dominique Armani Jones. Picture: Instagram

5. How old is Lil Baby?

Lil Baby was born on December 3 1994, making him currently 27-years-old. Picture: Instagram

6. How tall is Lil Baby?

Lil Baby is reportedly 5 feet 8 inches tall. The Atlanta rapper is around the average height for a man. Picture: Instagram

7. What is Lil Baby's net worth?

As of 2021, Lil Baby's net worth is currently an estimated $5 million, according to celebritynetworth.com. Picture: Instagram

8. Does Lil Baby have kids?

Lil Baby has two sons. His welcomed his eldest with his ex-girlfriend, a woman named Ayesha. In 2019, he welcomed his second son, Loyal, with his now ex-girlfriend Jayda Cheaves. Lil Baby keeps his family life very private and doesn't divulge much information about it. Picture: Instagram

9. Are Lil Baby and Gunna related?

Lil Baby and Gunna are not related. The pair collaborated on their impressive mixtape 'Drip Harder' in 2018 and have a great musical chemistry. However the two rappers are friends and not family. Picture: Instagram

10. Does Lil baby have Instagram?

Lil Baby is active on Instagram and can be found under the username @lilbaby. Picture: Instagram

11. Has Lil Baby released his debut album?

Lil Baby released his debut album 'Harder Than Ever' on 18th May 2018, with the project peaking at No. 3 in the Billboard Charts. However Baby has also released five mixtapes 'Perfect Timing', 'Harder Than Hard', '2 The Hard Way', 'Too Hard' and 'Drip Harder'. Picture: Instagram

12. Where is Lil Baby from?

Lil Baby was born and raised in Atlanta, Georgia in the Oakland City neighborhood. Picture: Instagram

13. How did Lil Baby meet Drake?

Speaking about his relationship: "Me and Drake first met a long time ago, but we established in 2018 that we were gonna make it happen. We just kicked it, chopped it up or whatever, then he sent me a song. I got on the song and he actually sent it back to let me have it." Picture: Instagram
